All Classes

Class Summary
Class Description
ClubAbstractEntity
class ClubAbstractEntity is an abstract class and is the backbone of the entire app.
it extends JFrame JFrame which makes it a JFrame by itself.
it holds all the instance variables needed for the entitiy to perform, and its relevant methods eg: ClubAbstractEntity.addToCenter(java.awt.Component)
NightClubMgmtApp
This class implements the main menu for the program and initializes all the different components ,including reading clubbers's data from a binary file, and writing it back into the file before the program closes.
This Class extends JFrame JFrame, which makes the entire NightClubMgmtApp a JFRAME.
It holds the clubbers ArrayList ClubAbstractEntity.
The buttons are instances of NightClubMgmtApp.buttons_array - a specific class that extends JButton.
Both button are going into a Jpanel JPanel buttonsPanel.
Person
public class Person extends ClubAbstractEntity which means each person entitiy is also a JFrame by itself.
this class holds several String instance variables id, name surname, tel that are the Person's details.
it also holds two arrays:
1.textFields which is a JTextField array.
Soldier
Public class Soldier which extends Person (which makes it a ClubAbstractEntity and also a JFrame).
Student
Public class Student which extends Person (which makes it a ClubAbstractEntity and also a javax.swing.JFrame).
